description: This file contains test cases for the HelloWorld Vue component using Vitest and Vue Test Utils.

methods.name: describe
methods.description: Defines a test suite for the HelloWorld component.

methods.name: it
methods.description: Defines a test case that checks if the HelloWorld component renders properly.

methods.name: expect
methods.description: Assertion method to verify component output.

ctags.name: wrapper
ctags.pattern: /^    const wrapper = mount(HelloWorld, { props: { msg: 'Hello Vitest' } })$/
